content.help: You'll win Mater's Memory Game by matching pictures of Mater and his friends. Match the pairs and beat the clock!
content.win:
Congratulations! This old junkyard has a
new champion! You've won a Cars Trading Card! Click here to collect
content.lose:
Your reflexes must be a little rusty!
Give it another shot!
content.title:
MATER'S
MEMORY GAME
